short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows communication between websites and Philips dictation devices

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension connects websites, such as speechlive.com, with Philips dictation hardware like Foot controls or SpeechMikes. Among other features, it allows using the buttons of Philips dictation hardware to control Philips SpeechLive (e.g. the webplayer, recorder or Speech to text). 

Please note: This extension only works in conjunction with the Philips Device Connector native host application! 

To set up Philips Device Connector properly, please follow the guide linked below:

https://www.dictation.philips.com/fileadmin/Products/pcl8000/ifu/guide/index.html

ISVs can use Philips Device Connector as a library to add Philips dictation device support to web apps. Please follow the guide linked below for further instructions:

https://www.dictation.philips.com/fileadmin/Products/pcl8010/ifu/index.html
